front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Vigilance
back.desc:
Vigilance, Anticipation, or Interest.
When mixed with Rage, yields Aggressiveness.
When mixed with Ecstacy, yields Optimism.
back.rule: Discard and shuffle into related cards
